name: .LUAC File Extension
summary: Learn about .LUAC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: LUAC files are not meant to be opened. To use a LUAC file as a VideoLAN VLC media player extension, put it in the correct sub-folder of VLC media player's lua folder. For example, if you have downloaded a LUAC file meant to allow you to stream content from a website, place that file in VLC media player's lua/â€‹playlist folder.
